00001 package liquibase.spring;
00002 
00003 import org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean;
00004 import org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware;
00005 import org.springframework.context.ResourceLoaderAware;
00006 import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;
00007 import org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader;
00008 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00009 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00010 import liquibase.database.Database;
00011 import liquibase.database.DatabaseFactory;
00012 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00013 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00014 
00015 import javax.sql.DataSource;
00016 import java.io.InputStream;
00017 import java.io.IOException;
00018 import java.io.File;
00019 import java.io.FileWriter;
00020 import java.net.URL;
00021 import java.util.Enumeration;
00022 import java.util.Vector;
00023 import java.util.TimeZone;
00024 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00025 import java.util.logging.Level;
00026 import java.sql.Connection;
00027 import java.sql.SQLException;
00028 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00029 
00073 public class SpringLiquibase implements InitializingBean, BeanNameAware, ResourceLoaderAware {
00074     public class SpringResourceOpener implements FileOpener {
00075         private String parentFile;
00076 
00077         public SpringResourceOpener(String parentFile) {
00078             this.parentFile = parentFile;
00079         }
00080 
00081 
00082         public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00083             Resource resource = getResource(file);
00084 
00085             return resource.getInputStream();
00086         }
00087 
00088         public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00089             Vector<URL> tmp = new Vector<URL>();
00090 
00091             tmp.add(getResource(packageName).getURL());
00092 
00093             return tmp.elements();
00094         }
00095 
00096         public Resource getResource(String file) {
00097             return getResourceLoader().getResource(adjustClasspath(file));
00098         }
00099 
00100         private String adjustClasspath(String file) {
00101             return isClasspathPrefixPresent(parentFile) && !isClasspathPrefixPresent(file)
00102                     ? ResourceLoader.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX + file
00103                     : file;
00104         }
00105 
00106         public boolean isClasspathPrefixPresent(String file) {
00107             return file.startsWith(ResourceLoader.CLASSPATH_URL_PREFIX);
00108         }
00109 
00110         public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00111             return getResourceLoader().getClassLoader();
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115     private String beanName;
00116 
00117     private ResourceLoader resourceLoader;
00118 
00119     private DataSource dataSource;
00120 
00121     private Logger log = Logger.getLogger(SpringLiquibase.class.getName());
00122 
00123     private String changeLog;
00124 
00125     private String contexts;
00126 
00127     public SpringLiquibase() {
00128         super();
00129     }
00130 
00131     public String getDatabaseProductName() throws JDBCException {
00132         Connection connection = null;
00133         String name = "unknown";
00134         try {
00135             connection = getDataSource().getConnection();
00136             Database database =
00137                     DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(dataSource.getConnection());
00138             name = database.getDatabaseProductName();
00139         } catch (SQLException e) {
00140             throw new JDBCException(e);
00141         } finally {
00142             if (connection != null) {
00143                 try {
00144                     if (!connection.getAutoCommit())
00145                     {
00146                       connection.rollback();
00147                     }
00148                     connection.close();
00149                 } catch (Exception e) {
00150                     log.log(Level.WARNING, "problem closing connection", e);
00151                 }
00152             }
00153         }
00154         return name;
00155     }
00156 
00162     public DataSource getDataSource() {
00163         return dataSource;
00164     }
00165 
00169     public void setDataSource(DataSource dataSource) {
00170         this.dataSource = dataSource;
00171     }
00172 
00178     public String getChangeLog() {
00179         return changeLog;
00180     }
00181 
00186     public void setChangeLog(String dataModel) {
00187 
00188         this.changeLog = dataModel;
00189     }
00190 
00191     public String getContexts() {
00192         return contexts;
00193     }
00194 
00195     public void setContexts(String contexts) {
00196         this.contexts = contexts;
00197     }
00198 
00202     public void afterPropertiesSet() throws LiquibaseException {
00203         Connection c = null;
00204         try {
00205             c = getDataSource().getConnection();
00206             Liquibase liquibase = createLiquibase(c);
00207 
00208             liquibase.update(getContexts());
00209         } catch (SQLException e) {
00210             throw new JDBCException(e);
00211         } finally {
00212             if (c != null) {
00213                 try {
00214                     c.rollback();
00215                     c.close();
00216                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00217                     //nothing to do
00218                 }
00219             }
00220         }
00221 
00222     }
00223 
00224     private Liquibase createLiquibase(Connection c) throws JDBCException {
00225         return new Liquibase(getChangeLog(), new SpringResourceOpener(getChangeLog()), DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(c));
00226     }
00227 
00231     public void setBeanName(String name) {
00232         this.beanName = name;
00233     }
00234 
00240     public String getBeanName() {
00241         return beanName;
00242     }
00243 
00244     public void setResourceLoader(ResourceLoader resourceLoader) {
00245         this.resourceLoader = resourceLoader;
00246     }
00247 
00248     public ResourceLoader getResourceLoader() {
00249         return resourceLoader;
00250     }
00251 }
